template.name: Canon Color MF printers Template
template.description: Template for color Canon Multi Functional printer.

item.name: Black.toner.model
item.description: Shows black toner name and model.

item.name: Cyan.toner.model
item.description: Shows printer cyan toner model and name.

item.name: Magenta.toner.model
item.description: Shows printer magenta model and name.

item.name: Total.print.No.of.copies
item.description: Shows printer total printed nuber of copies.

item.name: Total.scan.No.of.copies
item.description: Shows printer total scaned number of copies.

item.name: Yellow.toner.model
item.description: Shows printer toner model and name.

trigger.name: Black.toner.empty
trigger.description: Shows that black toner level reach 0.

trigger.name: Cyan toner.empty
trigger.description: Shows that cyan toner level reach 0.

trigger.expression: {Canon Color MF printers Template:Device.status.last(,60)}<>2 and {Canon Color MF printers Template:Device.status.last()}<>3 and {Canon Color MF printers Template:Device.status.last()}<>5
trigger.name: Printer Error status.
Yellow toner.empty
trigger.description: Shows that yellow toner level reach 0.
